caption: Merry Christmas and happy holidays from us at Merely Ice Cream! 🎄🎅🏻🎁Our outlet at Sunshine Plaza is taking a break for the day, but get you can get your ice cream fix at Our Tampines Hub from 1230-10pm today! p.s. don’t forget to cart out on our buy 3 get one free pint deal online, this special is until 31 December only!! 🛒

Tu more days to the year of the rabbit! 🐰 Our outlet in Tampines will be open all through the lunar new year so you’ll never be short of ice cream! Sunshine Plaza will be back on 25 Jan! 新年快乐，恭喜发财，红包拿来🧧🍊🍊

Thank you, Tampines. It has been a wonderful six-year journey.

We will always cherish the support you have shown us, particularly during the challenging times of the Covid-19 pandemic, and how you all rallied around us after hearing about our imminent closure.

It has been our utmost pleasure to serve you happy food.

Farewell! 👋🏼

Love is in the air this weekend before Valentine’s! Have you made your dinner bookings yet? We’ll be open till 10pm come Feb14, so you can have the sweetest ending to your day with your sweetheart 💕🥰 🍨
〰️
#merelyicecream #icecreamlovers #sgcafe #sgeats #sgfoodies #valentines #loveislove

You’re the ice cream to my waffle, the honey to my bee, the sugar to my coffee 🍨🧇🍯🐝🍬☕️ Happy Valentine’s Day lovers! p.s. our waffles and ice cream make the perfect dessert for sharing with your sweetheart 😘 tag someone you’d want to share it with this Valentine’s Day 🫶💖🥰

🎄MERELY A FESTIVE FLAVOUR 🎄Have you been naughty or nice this year? Our next Christmas special is all things nice with an ice cream base made of rich nutty roasted almond paste which perfectly complements the tart sour cherry compote🍒 the perfect finish to any meal!

🌟BUY 2 AND GET 1 FREE🌟
You’re in for a treat when hang with us from 𝗠𝗼𝗻𝗱𝗮𝘆 𝘁𝗼 𝗙𝗿𝗶𝗱𝗮𝘆, 𝟯-𝟲𝗽𝗺! Just buy 2 single scoops in cups and get 1 free*! School’s out so come while away the day with us, chilling with your buddies and eating ice cream! 

*free scoop applies to the lowest priced item

We're all secretly this happy that the Safe Management Measures have eased just in time for this super long weekend 🤩 Come make merry with us!

Hurray! 🥳 We're celebrating 10 years of scooping balls of happiness! Come on down to Merely at Sunshine Plaza or Our Tampines Hub from now till 3rd April because we're giving away 20 pints of ice cream!!! 😱

✌️ simple steps: 
1. Follow us on IG 
2. Every $10 you spend* enters you for a chance to win 

𝟭𝘀𝘁: 10 pints of ice cream 
𝟮𝗻𝗱: 6 pints of ice cream 
𝟯𝗿𝗱: 4 pints of ice cream 

*T&Cs apply: 
1. Applicable for purchases made in-store at Sunshine Plaza and Our Tampines Hub, between 25th March and 3rd April 
2. One(1) entry for every $10 spent, with a maximum of five(5) entries per receipt

🎄MERELY A FESTIVE FLAVOUR🎄This is Christmas decadence at it’s finest, and what better time to indulge that sweet tooth of yours!? Made with Valrhona Dulcey chocolate, which gives that rich caramelised and buttery goodness, topped with crunchy roasted pecans and toffee chunks, you’ll be asking for seconds for sure! 🤤

Years ago, we did a shoot with the good folks @themeatmensg on how to make our Banana Walnut flavour from the comfort of your own home with a simple ice cream machine.⁣
⁣
If you find it a hassle to do it yourself, why not preorder it from us and get it delivered to your doorsteps? You can find the order link on our bio. ⁣
⁣
